titles.title: FDA Cosmetic Safety and Modernization Act
FDA Cosmetic Safety and Modernization Act
A bill to modernize the regulation of cosmetics.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
FDA Cosmetic Safety and Modernization Act
This bill establishes a series of requirements relating to cosmetics regulation, including requiring cosmetics manufacturers and distributors to report serious adverse health events to the Food and Drug Administration.
